notes
property.value:
Uses v3 ruleset. Combat move before production.
You gain a national objective bonus for destroying TUV of other players each turn as follows: INDEPENDENTS ARENT WORTH THIS BONUS <li>TUV destroyed --- Total Bonus PU <li> 3 ---------- 1 <li> 10 ---------- 3 <li> 25 ---------- 7 <li> 50 ---------- 15
